solution_line_template: First find the number of cats Carmen has left: {initial_cats} cats - {cats_given_up} cats = <<{initial_cats}-{cats_given_up}={remaining_cats}>>{remaining_cats} cats

Then subtract the number of dogs from the number of cats to find the difference: {remaining_cats} cats - {num_dogs} dogs = <<{remaining_cats}-{num_dogs}={difference_cats_dogs}>>{difference_cats_dogs} more cats
